name: Awesomeness
subtitle: When I get sad, I stop being sad and be awesome instead. True Story.

name: Perfection
subtitle: It's not good enough to win, everybody should lose.

name: Lead with Vision
subtitle: Leaders keep their eyes on the horizon, not just on the bottom line.

name: Conformity
subtitle: It's the one who is different that gets left out in the cold.

name: Teamwork
subtitle: The chain is only as strong as the weakest link.

name: Strength
subtitle: What the mind can conceive, it can achieve.
